document_data.name: Samagard
document_data.mainbody: '''Samagard''' was a large town found in western [[Thindol]] on the [[Chultan Peninsula]].
document_data.Geography: Samagard was located on the [[River Gur]] between the [[Sanrach Mountains]] and the coast of the [[Thingulph]].
document_data.Activities: The town of Samagard was constructed across the river from a large fortress that guarded the eastern end of [[Sormarl Pass]]. The town was the only location within Thindol where [[Samarach]]an merchants were permitted to trade. Agents of the [[yuan-ti]] had secretly infiltrated the local trade consortiums in order to gather information on Samagard's weaknesses. The yuan-ti also did what they could to heighten tension between Samarach and Thindol.
